H0.text: The rights to which famous character were sold by creators Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster to Detective Comics for $130 in 1937. The Flash

H1.text: The rights to which famous character were sold by creators Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster to Detective Comics for $130 in 1937. Captain Marvel

H2.text: The rights to which famous character were sold by creators Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster to Detective Comics for $130 in 1937. Green Lantern

H3.text: The rights to which famous character were sold by creators Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster to Detective Comics for $130 in 1937. Supes

A4.text: Siegel and Shuster were paid US$130 for their work on Superman.

A5.text: Siegel and Shuster gave away the copyright for Superman to Detective Comics, Inc.
